roleset.name: involve in moral darkness, ignorance
roleset.note: BENIGHT-V, BENIGHTED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on AMR occurrence.

role.descr: thing involved in moral darkness, ignorance

example.name: benight-v
example.text: You might be familiar with the well-publicized challenges to classics like The Adventures of Huckleberry Finn and The Catcher in the Rye, or the more recent attempts *PRO* to muzzle Harry Potter and (further) benight Philip Pullman's series His Dark Materials.
example.arg: Philip Pullman's series His Dark Materials

example.name: benighted-j
example.text: no , it was n't an abstinance only program in the benighted sense of the late bush administration , but it did advocate for waiting until *you* felt ready and strategies for dealing with peer pressure .
